title: To hear or not to hear
creator_credit: Jill Mansfield, Jeff Osment and Green Hill Films
brief_description: A domestic scene is enacted twice - once from the perspective of a busy woman preparing a meal and then as seen by her partially deaf husband. Gives insights into the frustrations of both.
